General.Name: Prolexus Bhd
General.Description: Prolexus Berhad, an investment holding company, operates in apparel business in Malaysia, the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. The company operates through Apparels, Textile, Advertising, and Other segments. It manufactures, markets, and trades in apparel, which includes outerwear, tops and bottoms, and children and adult wear for various specializations, including running, training, performance sport, casual sportswear, gym, and yoga, as well as fabric face masks. It also manufactures fabrics, such as single and double knit, semi-jacquard, and digital knit fabrics. In addition, it offers property investment, agency, and apparel printing services, as well as advertising services on multimedia boards. Further, the company involved in marketing apparel and fabric face mask; and the e-commerce sale of casual wear and sportswear apparels. Additionally, it provides women's wear, including innerwear, under scarves, scarves, activewear, jubah abaya, and face mask under the Arumn brand. Prolexus Berhad was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Kluang, Malaysia.
